channel.title: Quest tab
channel.description:
I'm clicking on PK points in the quest tab and it is making the player say I have 0 donator points.
I cant find the file anywhere to change it I looked everywhere!!! can anyone help me out?

item.title: Quest tab
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

[quote=“D 3 4 T H 317, post:1, topic:548613”]I’m clicking on PK points in the quest tab and it is making the player say I have 0 donator points.

I cant find the file anywhere to change it I looked everywhere!!! can anyone help me out?[/quote]

ClickingButtons, or where ever handles your button clicking. Find the correct button id and change the text it displays.

Read full topic
